name: Thélème [unfinished]
description:
A game made for the Gothic Novel Jam by Allen Trivette and Lee Williams

Inspired by the following image from the British Library's Flickr album:

https://www.flickr.com/photos/britishlibrary/11289275103/in/album-72157639804990...

A short (and incomplete) vignette about the merchant ship Thélème that ran aground onto a glacier.

In its current state only 20% of the intended game is there. We do plan to finish it after the jam, however.

First build, July 30, 2018. v.001 - 20%
